relation: URL to open (if topic is not used)
View template to call when viewing a topic; not used for URLs
Create a new window for each popup?
textBeforeTable: The following standard attributes are recognized A %COMMENT% without parameters shows a simple text box. COMMENT{ attributes } -- insert an edit box into the topic to easily add comments. Related: BR, BULLET, BB, BB2, BB3, BB4, VBAR Current value: CARET = ^ The CARET macro is useful in TML tables. CARET -- caret symbol Related: IF, SpreadSheetPlugin %CALC{"$UPPER(Collaboration)"}% returns COLLABORATION %CALC{"$EXISTS(Web.SomeTopic)"}% returns 1 if the topic exists %CALC{"$SUM($ABOVE())"}% returns the sum of all cells above the current cell Examples: Syntax: %CALC{"formula"}% The %CALC{"formula"}% macro is handled by the SpreadSheetPlugin. There are around 90 formulae, such as $ABS(), $EXACT(), $EXISTS(), $GET()/$SET(), $IF(), $LOG(), $LOWER(), $PERCENTILE(), $TIME(), $VALUE(). CALC{"formula"} -- add spreadsheet calculations to tables and outside tables Related: JQueryButton Note: BUTTONS are floating to the left by default. Take care to add a %CLEAR% after the %BUTTON{...}% so that further content does not overlap with the button. Cancel Submit Expands as: }% %CLEAR% target="%WEB%.%TOPIC%" icon="cross" "%MAKETEXT{"Cancel"}%" %BUTTON{ }%
textAfterTable: Formatted time - either GMT or Local server time, depending on {DisplayTimeValues} setting in configure. Same format qualifiers as %GMTIME% Syntax: %DISPLAYTIME% OR %DISPLAYTIME{"format"}% %DISPLAYTIME% The time is shown as hh:mm (24 hour clock) Expands to: 01 Aug 2015 - 13:57 Example: %DISPLAYTIME{"$hou:$min"}% expands to 13:57 Related: GMTIME, SERVERTIME EDITACTION -- Selects an edit template The EDITACTION preference setting lets you define the use of an editaction template instead of the standard edit. If EDITACTION is defined as text, then hide the form. If EDITACTION is defined as form hide the normal text area and only edit the form. Syntax:  * Set EDITACTION = text|form Expands to: %EDITACTION% When EDITACTION is defined as text or form the Edit and Edit Raw buttons simply add ;action=text or ;action=form to the URL for the edit script. If you have defined an EDITACTION preference setting you can still edit the topic content or the form by removing the ;action=form or ;action=text from the edit URL in the browser and reload. Related: CommandAndCGIScripts#edit EDITTABLE{ attributes } -- edit tables using edit fields and other input fields
